name: Qliphort Scout
effectText:
Booting in Replica Mode...
An error has occurred while executing C:\sophia\zefra.exe
Unknown publisher.
Allow C:\tierra\qliphort.exe ? ＜Y／N＞...[Y]
Booting in Autonomy Mode…
pendEffect: You cannot Special Summon monsters, except "Qli" monsters. This effect cannot be negated. Once per turn: You can pay 800 LP; add 1 "Qli" card from your Deck to your hand, except "Qliphort Scout".
